page.title: 19FLOWERS ON THE DOWNS
page.content: We found lots of wild flowers on the Downs. They were growing by the edge of the path. We collected one of each kind to draw back at school and to identify.Some children put the flowers into groups according to their colour. The white flowers were daisies ,cow parsley,bladder campion and dead nettles.The purple flowers were herb robert and ground ivy. The blue ones were bluebells speedwell.The poppies were red.The yellow flowers were buttercups and dandelions.The green flowers were sticky weed,chickweed moss,stinging nettles,clover,silver weed and grasses like goose grass and ryegrass.Also dockleaf and plantain The trees were sycamore,hawthorn and fir trees.
